this-is-not-a-boarding-pass: This e-ticket is not a boarding pass.

general-info.local-time: Departure and arrival times are local
general-info.checkin: Check-in at the airport closes one hour before departure
general-info.refund-exchange: You can arrange a return and exchange by yourself in your personal account and on the website aviata.kz
general-info.support-schedule: Customer support service is available 24/7, including holidays and weekends.

inf-luggage-info: Carry-on and luggage are not allowed for infants
connection-self: Independent transfer, do not forget about your luggage

cashback.text: Pay for purchases with a Freedom Bank card and get up to 30% cashback!* Open the card in a couple of minutes in the <0>Freedom SuperApp</0> application
cashback.annotation: *Cashback is credited in Freedom investment currency. It can be used like regular money: pay, transfer and convert.
